alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Brunswick, southwestern Columbus and central Horry Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Loris, or 17 miles northeast of Conway, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tabor City, Loris, Bethel, Pireway, Dulah, Nakina, Goretown, Bughill, Allsbrook, Green Sea and Loris Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
